overview: The third film, A Family’s Spirit, follows Carmen Lopez, a Mexican-American salon owner and mother concerned about the health of herself and children. After her father’s death due to diabetes, her own experience with the disease during pregnancy and her son’s obesity diagnosis, she said she had an “awakening.”  Despite the challenges of making time to cook and finding healthful food in her neighborhood markets, she’s confident about the lifestyle changes her family is making.
title: A Family’s Spirit
